title: Split the desktop projects and packages
body:
**Description of Change**

In order to better support Gtk# v3 and .NET Core builds, we need to split up the SkiaSharp.Views package for the `net45` moniker into separate packages.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #893 
- Docs PR: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp-API-docs/pull/15

Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR.

**API Changes**

There should be no type changes, only an new `SKDrawingArea` for Gtk# v3.

**Behavioral Changes**

The behavior should not change, but since we are breaking up a dll and a package, this may affect users that depend on types being in a specific assembly.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
